evidence.title: Neoadjuvant anti-HER2 strategies in HER2-positive breast cancer
evidence.finding: Early biologic response can guide surgical timing and escalation/de-escalation pathways.

evidence.title: KRAS G12C-directed approaches in locally advanced NSCLC
evidence.finding: Integration of systemic induction regimens may improve multidisciplinary resection planning.

evidence.title: HRD and BRCA1-guided treatment sequencing in high-grade serous ovarian cancer
evidence.finding: HRD-positive disease benefits from maintenance-oriented planning following platinum response.

evidence.title: Tumor board data synthesis frameworks for precision oncology
evidence.finding: Structured multimodal summaries reduce decision latency and improve actionability.
